title: The Asset Allocator: The Pressure Has Been Building
author: Seeking Alpha
dc:creator: Seeking Alpha
description: The huge run-up in debt, Federal Reserve activism and a trend towards economic nationalism in the last decade may be the factors that most effect the current one, with the coronavirus pandemic merely triggering the shift. This podcast (8:42) suggests that a squeeze on consumer staples and agricultural commodities could trigger inflation, and a surge in inflation could prevent the Fed from easing financial conditions, which could trigger a debt crisis.  Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
